1.0.name: wordpress/mz-post-and-page-excerpts-widgets
1.0.description:
Creates widgets that display content excerpts or excerpts from posts or pages in the sidebar. You may use 'more' links, show featured image, set excerpt length of the post or page.

This also adds an excerpt field to your pages like posts have.

You can show content excerpt, the excerpt or both.

Option to highlight the output added.
